external_references.description: Lior Rochberger, Tom Fakterman, Robert Falcone. (2023, September 22). Cyberespionage Attacks Against Southeast Asian Government Linked to Stately Taurus, Aka Mustang Panda. Retrieved September 9, 2025.

objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has used [China Chopper](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0020) web shells to maintain access to victims’ environments.(Citation: Palo Alto Unit42 STATELY TAURUS TONESHELL September 2023)
